Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute at Ellis/54th
ShortDescription: 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via 53rd, Drexel, 55th, and Ellis due to, construction near Ellis/54th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 53rd, Drexel, 55th, and Ellis due to, construction near Ellis/54th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/31st

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
